tasks.coref.spl

Class SPLCoreferencePipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.spl.SPLCoreferencePipeline

  • public class SPLCoreferencePipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    The pipeline used to resolve coreference in SPL drug coreference dataset. This pipeline deals with all four coreference types: CoreferenceType.Anaphora, CoreferenceType.Cataphora, CoreferenceType.Appositive, and CoreferenceType.PredicateNominative.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • domainSpecificPreProcessing

        public static void domainSpecificPreProcessing(Document doc,
                                               SectionSegmenter segmenter)
        Task-specific preprocessing step, in which the document is segmented into sections.

        Section segmenter is provided as input.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process
        segmenter - the section segmenter to use

      • setTopics

        public static void setTopics(Document doc)
        Identifies document topics in a very rudimentary way. Based on the domain, the document topics are assumed to be drug, drug class, or substance names.

        It iterates through each sentence, trying to identify named entities of drug types. If more than one exists in a sentence, it adds all of them as topics. Once topic(s) are found, the method exits. An alternative could be to count the number of occurrence for each term, and decide accordingly.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to identify the topics for

      • coreferenceResolution

        public static void coreferenceResolution(Document doc)
        Resolves coreference in a single SPL drug coreference document. It recognizes coreferential mentions and then identifies coreference relations. For the SPL dataset, this includes relations of all 4 coreference types.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • coreferentialMentionDetection

        public static void coreferentialMentionDetection(Document doc)
        Detects coreferential mentions in a document, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • mentionReferentLinking

        public static void mentionReferentLinking(Document doc)
        Links coreferential mentions to their referents and generates CoreferenceChain objects.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • postProcessing

        public static void postProcessing(Document doc)
        Post-processes the generated coreference chains for consistency and relevance.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • pruneCoreferenceChains

        public static void pruneCoreferenceChains(Document doc)
        Prunes anaphoric chains in which the mention is also involved in a cataphoric chain.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process

      • generateCoreferenceChain

        public static void generateCoreferenceChain(Document doc,
                                            SurfaceElementChain chain)
        Adds a CoreferenceChain object to the document, given the textual units involved in it. It performs consistency checks, merges mentions into other coreference chains, and handles chains involving coordinated items.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document being processed
        chain - the chain of textual units

      • writeStandoffAnnotations

        public static void writeStandoffAnnotations(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem>> writeTypes,
                                            java.lang.String outFileName,
                                            Document doc)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Writes relevant semantic objects as standoff annotations to an output file.
        Parameters:
        writeTypes - the semantic object types to write
        outFileName - the output file to write to
        doc - the document that contains the semantic objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if outFileName cannot be opened

      • coreferenceChainToSPLStandoffAnnotation

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> coreferenceChainToSPLStandoffAnnotation(CoreferenceChain cc)
        Converts a CoreferenceChain object to a list of standoff annotation lines as expected for the SPL drug coreference dataset.
        Parameters:
        cc - the coreference chain
        Returns:
        a list of corresponding standoff annotation lines

      • writableCorefChain

        public static boolean writableCorefChain(SemanticItem exp,
                                         SemanticItem ref)
        Determines whether the coreference chain with the arguments exp and ref are to be written.

        If gold coreferential mentions are used, this method returns true if the arguments are coreferential mentions or drug-related entities. If gold coreferential mentions aren't used, either the referent should be a drug-related entity OR (the coreferential mention argument should be pronominal AND the referent should include a hypernym) OR the coreferential mention should include a hypernym.

        Parameters:
        exp - the coreferential mention of the chain
        ref - the referent of the chain
        Returns:
        true if the coreference chain with the arguments can be written

      • toWrite

        public static boolean toWrite(SemanticItem sem)
        Determines whether a semantic object is to be written to output.

        A semantic object is written to output, if it is a drug-related entity or a coreferential mention.

        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object
        Returns:
        true if the semantic object can be written to output

      • init

        public static void init()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads properties from properties file and initializes WordNet, section segmenter, and coreference-related word lists. It also loads resolution strategies.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the section segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the section segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the section segmenter cannot be initialized
        java.io.IOException - if properties file cannot be found
